title: Profile on Boards bug?
body:
I just logged in after couple of months on lol website and went to my profile it said lvl 19 and i know that i am lvl 30 now i fixed this couple of minutes ago by commething but after everything worked i went to my profile again and i only see one thing and that thing is comment and i also had 8 lifetime upvotes now i have one 

*Update 
it came back to lvl 19 again hope lol fixes this bug this happened to me couple of months ago  

Sorry for grammar and my not so good english

replies.body: Your boards profile appears to be level 30 here so it could be a caching issue which [clearing ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)could fix.  Let me know if this is still an issue!
